definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The crown is the source of oxygen, worker of the magic of photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 樹冠是氧的來源，是神奇光合作用的製造者。

sentences.english: The most common by far is photosynthetic plants that capture solar energy.
sentences.chinese: 最普遍的是一些吸收太陽能進行光合作用的植物。

sentences.english: With proper rate of sulphur fertilizer application, the photosynthetic rate of soybean was increased.
sentences.chinese: 適當的施用硫肥能提高大豆光合作用強度。

sentences.english: We now co-opt between one third and one half of all the photosynthesis on the planet.
sentences.chinese: 而地球上的光合作用僅僅爲之前的三分之一到一半。

sentences.english: Some of our most important crop plants are ones that are not very efficient at photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 而我們一些重要農作物的光合作用效率不高。

sentences.english: The optimal temperature for photosynthesis is 20 to 25 degrees Celsius.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用的最適溫度爲20至25攝氏度。

sentences.english: Photoprotection, Photoinhibition, Gene Regulation, and Environment ( Advances in Photosynthesis and Respiration Vol. 21 )
sentences.chinese: 光，光合作用，基因調控，與環境。

sentences.english: The row-crop plant stand architect and canopy photosynthesis models are combining to construct sunlight greenhouse cucumber canopy photosynthesis in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本研究構建了日光溫室黃瓜冠層光合作用數學模型。

sentences.english: The photosynthesis and the azotaseactivity were decreased in Mo deficient soybean.
sentences.chinese: 缺鉬大豆的光合作用和固氮酶活性降低。

sentences.english: African violets need light for photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 非洲堇進行光合作用需要光照。

sentences.english: Chlorophyll content was significantly positively correlated with the net photosynthetic rates during the seed-filling period.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠素含量與光合作用速率在鼓粒期呈顯著正相關。
光合作用是吸收能量的過程。

sentences.english: The scientists say the photosynthesis process continued normally in these plants.
sentences.chinese: 科學家稱光合作用在這些植物中正常的進行着。

sentences.english: Photosynthesis shuts down, halting the production of chlorophyll in leaves.
sentences.chinese: 它們關閉了光合作用，減少了樹葉中葉綠素的產量。

sentences.english: Leaf photosynthetic temperature characteristics of wild rice were studied.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究了菰葉片光合作用溫度特性。

sentences.english: Drought stress aggravated the photoinhibition of photosynthesis at noon.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱脅迫加重了午間光合作用的光抑制。

definition: assimilation/anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)
